title: How many musicians are there? - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s about seven billion, singing, tapping rhythms, playing simple and more complicated instruments. Remember: You are your first instrument. Your voice is the most marvellous musical instrument of all. The music is not in the instrument (violin, guitar or whatever): it’s in you! The greatest musician we know of is J S Bach who said: All music should have no other end and aim than the glory of God and the recreation of the soul; where this not kept in mind there is no true music, but only an infernal clamour and ranting.

Here's a great blog that goes over how to answer this questions: How Many Musicians Are There?.  A few data points used:   ~70K tracked by BLS data~900 represented by 2 major industry associations (includes songwriters, musicians, and composers)~700K artists, musicians, writers in census data  ~14K Pollstar actsThese numbers pertain mostly to US "professional" musicians.
